Reviews.Title: It arrived and didn't work.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey D Buehrle
Reviews.Content: I received the hat, attached it to my PC to charge its battery overnight and tried turning it on the next morning. It didn't come on. I plugged it back into my PB and tried turning it on, and it then came on I think. The green LED I was supposed to see didn't come on either. It kinda defeats the purpose of owning it if I have to carry a computer around with me.
